sentences.en: He is an excellent long - distance rower.
sentences.cn: 他是一名出色的长距离划手.

sentences.en: Just last year, British ocean rower Roz Savage became the first woman to cross the Pacific Ocean alone, in a rowboat.
sentences.cn: 就在去年，英国海洋桨手罗兹萨维奇成为了独自划船跨越太平洋的第一名女性。

sentences.en: Now they had one senior manager, six management consultants and one rower.
sentences.cn: 这次他们有一个高级舵手、六个舵手顾问、一个划桨员。

sentences.en: So the American company fired the rower.
sentences.cn: 因此，美国公司解雇了划桨员。

sentences.en: The modern master is Steve Redgrave of Great Britain, widely hailed as the greatest rower ever.
sentences.cn: 当代赛艇明星是英国的史蒂夫·德格雷夫, 他被誉为历史上最好的选手.

sentences.en: Working with weights sculpts your muscles, while the cycle, treadmill, and rower are great for fat - burning.
sentences.cn: 举重运动能塑造你的肌肉, 骑车 、 步行 、 划船十分有利于脂肪的消耗.

sentences.en: You need to have tremendous power in your arms and legs to be a good rower.
sentences.cn: 电力,动力;功率.通常是指制造电力或机械所需的能量.
